data.body:
Current overall: 82.43% stmts, 68.32% branches, 89.22% funcs, 85.82% lines. Target: ≥90% statements and lines.

Files below 90% needing improvement (sorted by impact):
- registry.ts: 64.35% stmts (uncovered: 61,181,198,207)
- workflows.ts: 66.29% stmts (uncovered: 46,599,605-689) — largest file, biggest impact
- knots-backend.ts: 70.9% stmts (uncovered: 54-858,917-940)
- beads-backend.ts: 73.06% stmts (uncovered: 67,571-573,581)
- agent-history.ts: 78.85% stmts (uncovered: 92-294,329-336)
- doctor.ts: 83.19% stmts (uncovered: 1058-1063,1079)
- bd.ts: 83.44% stmts (uncovered: 20,552,583,656)
- settings.ts: 85.71% stmts (uncovered: 90-315,361-362)
- app-store.ts: 89.28% stmts
- status-usage.ts: 58.33% stmts (small file)
- memory-manager-commands.ts: 67.85% stmts

Also consider excluding test helper mock-backend-port.ts from coverage metrics.

Strategy: Focus on workflows.ts, knots-backend.ts, beads-backend.ts, and registry.ts first — they have the most uncovered lines and biggest impact on the overall number.
data.title: Raise overall test coverage from 82% to 90%+
